entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
